text.div:
Procedure Device Action Codes

Example value set for Procedure Device Action code (what happened to a device during a procedure.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/device-action defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
implanted Implanted The device was implanted in the patient during the procedure.
explanted Explanted The device was explanted from the patient during the procedure.
manipulated Manipulated The device remains in that patient, but its location, settings, or functionality was changed.

name: Procedure Device Action Codes
description: Example value set for Procedure Device Action code (what happened to a device during a procedure.

concept.definition: The device was implanted in the patient during the procedure.
The device was explanted from the patient during the procedure.
The device remains in that patient, but its location, settings, or functionality was changed.
